website_summaries.verdict: This unique take on a highball glass is both comfortable to hold and visually appealing. The low cost can't be beat.
pros: The square base and rounded top design is unique and makes the glasses comfortable to hold
Glasses are thick and sturdy, they hold up well in the dishwasher
The wide opening also makes the glasses easy to hand wash. Comes in a set of 4
cons: Glasses can not be stacked on top of each other

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: I love these glasses, the design is unique - very good looking, stable, comfortable to hold, but I always have to buy at least twice as many as I need because so many of them come with a very visible, obvious flaw. The corners of the glass are supposed to turn smooth so that the glass becomes round near the top. Instead one or more of the sides have a fold in the glass. Poor quality control. The first set l bought about 20years ago by Circleware had no flaws.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth P.

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, well designed glasses. They fit well in my hand and it is a pleasure to drink from them. I can not attest to their durability since none broke, in spite of the daily wash they receive in our dish washer. In my opinion, they will serve any drink with the exception of wine or martinis.
customer_reviews.author: NoDumbName

customer_reviews.title: NOT PACKED WELL BY AMAZING N!
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful glasses. Sturdy and comfortable to hold in your hand.This is my second time ordering. I guess with the holidays, Amazon has become too busy to pack carefully. The set I received today was not taped shut, placed in the larger box upside down. When I lifted the box, ALL the glasse slid right out and one broke!!! Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Margie

customer_reviews.title: Love my new glasses.
customer_reviews.text: Was hesitant to purchase as there were so many negative comments about the quality of the glass. Edge at the top were not smooth, side seams could be felt, etc. I received my shipment and was delighted that they are just beautiful and elegant.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Gentry

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because all my other glasses narrow at the top and fall over in the dishwasher. They aren't as pretty as my other glasses but I really couldn't deal with the dishwasher fiasco anymore. I gave the other pretty ones away and now use these exclusively.
customer_reviews.author: Angela M

customer_reviews.title: I mean they are glasses
customer_reviews.text: I love the shape of these and they are the perfect size. I keep breaking them and they increased the price so it is harder for me to replace them. It’s too bad. I love that square glasses fit in my cabinet better
customer_reviews.author: C-rock

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking sturdy glasses
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these glasses as a gift for my son. They arrived intact with sturdy product boxes. They are attractive with heavy bottoms and a natural grip. (Once he starts using them I'll post on they're durability)
customer_reviews.author: Lori L Jeschke

customer_reviews.title: Cracked after one use
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased with the look of these upon arrival but one of the glasses cracked after one use. Very disappointed and would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KYMom

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I use these glasses for orange juice, iced tea and milk. The unique shape makes them easy to grip and visually appealing.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Brown

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Others have complained about defects in workmanship or that the glasses break too easily. I had no such problems. They look great, and are easy to hold and drink from. Knocking over a glass on my granite counter top has caused other glasses to break, but these seem to be sturdier than most. I haven't broken one yet.
customer_reviews.author: Steve C

customer_reviews.title: Wedding gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a wedding gift! I took a peak before wrapping them! They look great and feel good in the hand! Not cheap!
customer_reviews.author: Nichole S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Shape
customer_reviews.text: Excellent glasses for the price. With the shape of these glasses they are very comfortable to hold. Will buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: They are extraordinarily high quality and truly beautiful! I'll never purchase glassware from any department stores ...
customer_reviews.text: One rich and regal sound to these glasses! They are extraordinarily high quality and truly beautiful! I'll never purchase glassware from any department stores again!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle R. Monroe

customer_reviews.title: I love these glasses!
customer_reviews.text: they arrived in perfect condition, well packed. i love the design; square bottom leading to a circle top. they look cool and are easy to hold. good buy
customer_reviews.author: Branden

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I like them. Durable build with thick glass so I don't think it will crack or shatter easily. Like the design. The box it came in was kinda cheesy but the product is what matters.
customer_reviews.author: ND

customer_reviews.title: Easy to hold & pretty
customer_reviews.text: Easy to hold, simple & pretty design, nice weight. Great size.
customer_reviews.author: Songsmith

customer_reviews.title: I love these!
customer_reviews.text: I love these, I seek them in the cabinet, the are great everyday glasses as well as attractive dinner glasses. Sturdy yet pretty
customer_reviews.author: littlemomma

customer_reviews.title: I didn't care for the quality
customer_reviews.text: The glasses have molding marks vertically and extending the length of the glass. I like the size & weight but wanted a crystal clear glass with no molding marks.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Suits our new decor
customer_reviews.text: These are clean, sleek, minimalistic in appearance. Like the feel of the squared lower portion of the glass. Would recommend. Price was reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: CristCross

customer_reviews.title: Nice thick base
customer_reviews.text: These glasses not only look good, they are really hard to tip over.
customer_reviews.author: mark barden

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful water cup! I've got complement on it from a friend. Big enough to hold water for me.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Light and sturdy, great value
customer_reviews.text: These glasses seem like an exceptional value so far. They are surprisingly sturdy for being as light as they are, which gives them a very high-end feel, despite the low price point. Very attractive, very functional; I am pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Excellent glasses
customer_reviews.text: They hold a lot of volume and perfect for me!
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Fox

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Theses are great. They are clear so I can see when my vodka is low. Also they don’t leak , that a plus for this MOTHER CHUCKER.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but the quality is amazing, they feel very high end
customer_reviews.text: I know they're just cups... but the quality is amazing, they feel very high end.
customer_reviews.author: RachelN

customer_reviews.title: Well priced and beautiful. Love mine!
customer_reviews.text: Delighted w my decision to buy these. Well-priced and beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Diane H. Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these Glasses! They are a nice solid thick Glass and look great! I will be buying another set...
customer_reviews.author: RH

customer_reviews.title: Broken within a week
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these glasses and within a week one of them has already cracked. :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are nice, heavy glasses. The glass does not tip easily and is easy to drink from.
customer_reviews.author: Allen B.

customer_reviews.title: Came in super fast
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and goes well with my square dishes. Perfect match.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Laird

customer_reviews.title: Missing glass
customer_reviews.text: Only received a few not all of the glasses in the box. Could only get a refund if I returned them. Not worth the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with my product. Would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: fragile
customer_reviews.text: i like the way these glasses looked so bought them. unfortunately, they break very easily. i know glass breaks but these seem to crack at the slightest touch - especially the top since they taper from a thick bottom to thin rim. they're nice glasses but not so practical.
customer_reviews.author: GTF

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: These are great drinking quality glasses. I decided to move away from using less plastic due to the fact that plastic materials can seep into our food and drinks. These glasses have work good for Me. I use them for drinking everything out off. Including My smoothies
customer_reviews.author: King

customer_reviews.title: Truly Nice Glasses
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are just what I was looking for. I love the square shape and the heavy leaded bottom. They were described at 17 oz., but I don't think they are in comparing them to my 16 oz. glasses. Regardless, I am happy with them. And the price was right too.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Solid, really nice looking.
customer_reviews.text: Really solid , comfortable to hold (I have small hands), cleans easily. I had bought a set of similar glasses at bed bath beyond and within a month the bottoms started to haze, looking like old milk stains. Yuck! I will be buying a 2nd set of these.
customer_reviews.author: rr

customer_reviews.title: Thick, durable glasses
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are thick and durable. They have a nice weigh to the base, easy to hold, and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Customeyez

customer_reviews.title: Bought two sets
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for large glasses that looked nice too. These do the job. Easy to hold, good quality, don’t know if they contain lead but I’m happy with it. Purchased two sets because 4 is really less for us.
customer_reviews.author: Pearl

customer_reviews.title: Good choice!
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I wish that I had ordered them a long time ago. They are a great size, have a clean and modern look, and are dishwasher safe while they are simple to wash by hand. Get some!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Ann Thrope

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses to have
customer_reviews.text: I really like these glasses, esp since they have a little more of a modern look. They make it seem like I have my act together when I have other people over visiting, ha
customer_reviews.author: Desi

customer_reviews.title: These Worry Me
customer_reviews.text: I'm afraid the sturdy base is at the cost of a fragile rim. I'm fairly clumsy. I doubt these will survive a year of me hand washing them. Otherwise they seem perfectly alright.
customer_reviews.author: Some Guy

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Oh man, these glasses suck. 3 of the 4 have broken at the slightest little tap. Even my $1 glasses from Target are more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Holds up really well
customer_reviews.text: I needed something thicker because my glasses kept breaking in the sink, despite putting in a plastic tub to protect breakables. These hold up nice and generically matches my dishes.
customer_reviews.author: BAFTF

customer_reviews.title: these glasses are pretty. I ordered 16
customer_reviews.text: these glasses are pretty. I ordered 16. 2 months later 10 have broken all in dishwasher. poor thin quality.
customer_reviews.author: Chromevrod

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I bought square clear glass dishes and was happy to find the exact style glassware I wanted (square base to match the new dishes but round opening). They are a bit thin, but otherwise no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Form meets function
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these for a couple of months. They look great, do well in the dishwasher, and the square design makes them easier to grip.
customer_reviews.author: Grosse Pointe Blank

customer_reviews.title: Really like these!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these tall glasses (high ball) because I enjoy classic designs. I ordered a set about a month before deciding to get a 2nd set. The second set had 2 glasses of 6 with flaws. It doesn't keep me from using them though. The less one star is about overall craftsmanship and QC. They should have noted the flaws.
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: Nice Glasses!!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice glasses. Perfect for everyday use. Very happy with purchase. Good value 🤗
customer_reviews.author: Toni G

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Glass !!!
customer_reviews.text: Good balance when holding ... not top-heavy like many other glasses ... solid build and holds alot !!!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis M

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, not too fragile feeling. Attractive design. Will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Iko

customer_reviews.title: This is the best glasses I got
customer_reviews.text: This is the best glasses I got. Very nice and good hold. This are thick glasses hence rare chance of breaking in dishwasher and any other small hit. I am happy with this buy.
customer_reviews.author: Debasish Roy

customer_reviews.title: they look good and haven't broken from just handwashing yet
customer_reviews.text: They're glasses, they look good and haven't broken from just handwashing yet. Overall great product.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good glasses
customer_reviews.text: Only had them for a couple of months but I like them a lot. Look nice, easy to use, nice size
customer_reviews.author: Jana Anders

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice glasses! I love the thick glass bottom that tapers up to a thin elegant top edge.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: I Adore these!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazingly fantastic Glasses!!! I Adore them! Heavy and strong!
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Very happy.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Exactly what I was looking for in shape, and size. Arrived on time. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The glasses are really nice, and they arrived very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne D

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but smaller than I thought they'd be
customer_reviews.text: Way smaller than they appear. I thought 17 ounces would be larger and the pictures make the glasses look larger. But they are quite small. However, good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Joia

Made of glass enabling the color of the beverage to shine. Elegant look and adds to any table's aesthetics with their contemporary design. Why Choose a glass over plastic? It allows you to Sip colder and more pure-tasting water, looks sleek and elegant, and is thicker and sturdier than plastic. Glass is also better for the planet: made from all-natural, sustainable raw materials, glass is 100% recyclable and can be reused endlessly. Glass is the only packaging material generally regarded as safe by the U. S. Food & drug Administration. Glass is made from all-natural, sustainable raw materials, is 100% recyclable, and can be recycled endlessly with no loss in quality or purity. Helps clean-up The planet. Using glass rather than plastic significantly reduces landfill. It also saves energy on plastic inefficient recycling process. And unlike that metastasizing heap of mismatched plastic cups in your kitchen cupboard, once you invest in glass, your supply pretty much stays steady. With care, you’ll use your original glass containers almost indefinitely. If you break a glass, you can recycle it without guilt: up to 80% of all recycled glass can be reclaimed. Recycled glass Uses 40% less energy than manufacturing new glass. Recycling doesn’t compromise glass’ quality or structure and no toxins are produced in its recycling. Now you can fully enjoy your drinks with your family and friends while impressing them with these stylish and modern glasses.
